id.description: Unique identifier for the day, formatted as 'day[X]' where X is the day number

dayNumber.description: Sequential number of the day in the itinerary

title.description: A brief title describing the day's activities

emoji.description: An emoji that describes the theme of the day

date.description: Date of the trip day (month and day, without the year)

from.description: Starting location/accommodation (lodging from the previous day)

to.description: Ending location/accommodation (lodging for the current day)

src.description: URL to an overview image for the day (find this in the provided images)

text.description: An inspirational quote that captures the essence of the day

summary.description: A brief overview of the day that gives the reader a sense of what to expect and excites them

shortSummary.description: Brief overview of the day's itinerary

time.description: Total estimated driving time (be precise and think carefully)

from.description: Starting point of segment (lodging or scheduled activity)

to.description: Ending point of segment (lodging or scheduled activity)

time.description: Estimated driving time for segment (be precise and think carefully)

mapUrl.description: Embedded map URL for the day's route (find this clearly marked in the provided data)

title.description: A short title for the activity

description.description: A brief description of the activity

details.description: Relevant details as bullet points (should only be added to featured activities)

isFeatured.description: Whether the activity is featured (look for items marked as featured or highlights in the data, then use judgment to feature a few things for the day)

isGem.description: Whether the activity is marked as a hidden gem

isUserSelected.description: Whether the activity was selected by the user (if true in previous context maintain it, otherwise set to false)

cost.description: Cost of the activity in USD (if there are associated costs)

quickStops.description: A list of quick viewpoints, photo spots, or other quick stops along the way (note if they occur before or after the scheduled activity)

typeEmoji.description: Emoji representing the type of activity (photo, hike, restaurant, shopping, history, viewpoints, waterfall, cultural, tour, lodging, museum)

link.description: Link to more information about the activity

highlights.description: A few items that will be highlights for the day

name.description: Name of the accommodation (found in tripit data)

address.description: Address of the accommodation (found in tripit data)

cost.description: Cost of the accommodation in USD

roomType.description: Type of room booked (from tripit data)

amenities.description: Amenities provided (only include those you can determine with confidence, do not invent data)

title.description: A short title for the alternative activity

description.description: A brief description of the alternative activity (include details about duration and if it requires prebooking)

location.description: The general area where the activity is located and how it would fit into the day

isGem.description: Whether the alternative is a hidden gem

isUserSelected.description: Whether the alternative was selected by the user

timing.description: Best time to do the alternative activity (Morning, afternoon, evening)

link.description: Link to more information about the alternative

title.description: Title of the bad weather alternative

description.description: Description of the bad weather alternative

location.description: Location of the bad weather alternative

cost.description: Cost of the bad weather alternative

timing.description: Best time to do the bad weather alternative

link.description: Link to more information about the bad weather alternative
